text: Kwek Leng Beng (born 1941) is a Singaporean businessman and a billionaire. Kwek Leng Beng is the executive chairman of Hong Leong Group Singapore. In 2019, his net worth to be US$3.4 billion. == Background == Kwek Leng Beng chose to join the family business in the early 1960s after he was trained as lawyer in London. == Career == Kwek Leng Beng went on to establish an international reputation for his leadership of the Hong Leong Group where he became the chairman, which is now a conglomerate with over 300 companies. == Personal Life == Kwek got married to Cecilia Kok, His younger son Kingston was a private investor and a venture capitalist, his son Sherman is CDL's CEO. Kwegotis married to Cecilia Kokitalist. == References == Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Singaporean businesspeople
title: Kwek Leng Beng
